metadata.title: CVE-2019-19637 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in libsixel 1.8.2. There is an integer overflow inthe function sixel_decode_raw_impl at fromsixel.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-19637` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsixel-bin - 1.8.6-1
libsixel-examples - 1.8.6-1
libsixel1 - 1.8.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsixel package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.6-1').
